name: Triple Bubble Trouble - Part One
description:
Triple Bubble Trouble is here! Play the very first part of the game and see the story, characters and most importantly the mood in the game. 

Triple Bubble Trouble  is an Adult Visual Novel game with story placed in real-life like world. You play as a male student Name-kun, who mysteriously lost his memories. Discover the world of drama, comedy, horror and romance with our heroines, emphazing the fan service. Every girl has unique style, hobbies and personality, acting differently in every situation you come across.

This game contains gore, sexual and abusive elements and is not intended for children or easily disturbed people! Play with caution!

This part has over 15 000 words and is introduction to the main plot. Also keep in mind there are few parts with branching stories, so you can go back really fast before a decision and check out all of the parts. Renpy engine makes it super easy when it comes to saving and skipping, even going back.

Keep in mind there are few videos in this part of the game, which are easy skippable, but you can always go back to it if you accidentaly skipped it. Also there are 2 videos at the end of the game, one after another, don't miss those out :)

Art will be seeing some improvements in the near future and few poses will be added.

Studio Vely team>

Directed by Filip aka Bubo

Artist and writer Maja Leiner

Extra help provided by>

Background music by AlcaAnimusic 

Music in videos by Smogart

Song in the last video by Persephone

For more info visit official web site> www.studio-vely.com
